page.title: 13Transport _local services
page.content: In our block the main transport for people who haven't got a car are buses and trains.The main transport is by private cars,when our class did a survey on how many vehicles passed in one hour the total for cars was 550,there were 12 cars with trailers ,12motor cycles.12 buses and coaches, 102 light goods vehicles and 78 other goods vehicles.Altogether the total came to 784 vehicles going both ways on the A596.We have 3 different bus services going each way,usually from Workington to Maryport,then on to Carlisle sometimes going the other way from Maryport through Flimby to Workington and then on to Whitehaven. About 5 passenger trains go through Flimby each way,every day.
